Text: It would be alot of fun if, in balance, they would do films on Clintons gun running, drug trafficing, and  other illegal activities in Arkansas as well as Hillary's wiretapping, stealing of FBI files on those who opposed them.  Be interesting to see a balance.  Vote Obama!!
